steps.title: Search for Routes
steps.description: Select your departure and destination districts, choose your journey date, and optionally set a return date for round trips.

steps.title: Choose Your Bus
steps.description: Browse available buses for your route, compare timings, amenities, and prices to find the perfect match for your journey.

steps.title: Select Seats
steps.description: Pick your preferred seats from the interactive seat map and provide passenger details for a personalized travel experience.

steps.title: Complete Payment
steps.description: Review your booking summary, choose your payment method, and confirm your booking to receive instant ticket confirmation.
